metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2530 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3.2 isaffected. Safari before 10.1.1 is affected. iCloud before 6.2.1 on Windowsis affected. tvOS before 10.2.1 is affected. The issue involves the"WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code orcause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via acrafted web site.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
